findings.notes: This is the package initialization file, not a plugin module. Contains plugin contract documentation.
Welcome tab plugin. Demonstrates plugin protocol. PLUGIN_ORDER=0 (not in expected list but valid).
7-phase project wizard. Complete implementation with all phases defined. Expected PLUGIN_ORDER matches.
File explorer with Carl integration. Includes deep scan capabilities. Expected PLUGIN_ORDER matches.
Louis file protection UI. Manages protected paths and git hooks. Expected PLUGIN_ORDER matches.
Database conversion UI. Interfaces with Connie engine. Expected PLUGIN_ORDER matches.
TypeScript CLI bridge. Dynamic plugin discovery and execution. Expected PLUGIN_ORDER matches.

recommendations: All expected plugins (01-05) are present and compliant with the plugin contract
Found bonus plugin 00_welcome.py which serves as a getting started guide
All plugins follow consistent naming patterns with emojis for visual identification
All plugins properly import marimo as mo within the render() function for reactivity
All plugins use STATE_MANAGERS dictionary pattern for reactive state access
Consider documenting that PLUGIN_ORDER can start at 0 (welcome) or 1 (generator) in __init__.py

PLUGIN_NAME_constant.details: All 6 plugin modules define PLUGIN_NAME as a string with emoji prefix

PLUGIN_ORDER_constant.details: All 6 plugin modules define PLUGIN_ORDER as an integer (0-5)

render_function.details: All 6 plugin modules define render(STATE_MANAGERS) function

syntax_validation.details: All plugin modules compile successfully with py_compile

import_validation.details: All plugins defer marimo imports to render() function to avoid circular dependencies
